teams.name: Team Mellen
teams.loan_because: We want to share what we have with others.
teams.description: We love having fun and sharing some of the joy that we have in our lives.

teams.name: Trolltech Foundation
teams.loan_because: we believe that empowering people to help themselves is the path to true and lasting prosperity.
teams.description:
The Trolltech Foundation was founded by the first 8 founders and employees of the company Trolltech. We transferred company shares to the foundation with the philosophy that we should not forget the world around us if we had success. We achieved great success and when the company was sold to Nokia the foundation sold its shares.

We are a non-profit charitable foundation and aim to help people in developing countries. We think Kiva is a great way to achieve this.

teams.name: Tieks by Gavrieli
teams.loan_because: To empower women all over the world.
teams.description: The Tieks Team is a socially conscious group of people dedicated to lending and empowering women entrepreneurs all over the world.

teams.name: Kiva Christians
teams.loan_because:
Pure and undefiled religion before God the Father is this: to care for orphans and widows in their misfortune and to keep oneself unstained by the world. (Jam. 1:27)

Link to information regarding Christian partners       
www.gerv.net/info/christian-field-partners
teams.description: A group of believers in Jesus Christ, brought together through a common purpose: to help those in need around the world.

teams.name: milepoint
teams.loan_because: As travelers we have seen poverty first hand and are committed to making the world a better place for all.
teams.description: Travelers who collect miles and points and seek free flights, hotel rooms and upgrades where possible. Here we seek to give back and invite everyone to join with us and make a difference.
